Html:
Hi guys,

We all know Kavan and Hina are a bit busy right now with other things and unable to make a release.  Because of that, I'll try to cut a Rawr release early next week.

I'm aiming for Monday, December 24th.  If I can't, then I'll do it some time after Christmas (26th onwards).

My message to the rest of you developers is, if you have something outstanding you'd really like to get in this release then please wrap it up by the end of this weekend.  I won't be doing anything until about 10am pacific time on 12/24, so that's your deadline to get things done.

Thanks for all your hard work, it's only through everyone's contribution that we have anything to post at all!

Char

FYI, too much Christmas preparations to get it done today (need to bake cookies for Santa, otherwise... no presents!!!).  Will shoot for Wednesday / Thursday.

 

Happy holidays!

 

Char
Alright, maybe I'll update Mage Combustion today then.

Charinna wrote:

FYI, too much Christmas preparations to get it done today (need to bake cookies for Santa, otherwise... no presents!!!).  Will shoot for Wednesday / Thursday.

 

Happy holidays!

 

Char

You know what its like when Santa doesnt bring what you really wanted?
What I really want for xmas is an update. Thanks Guys and Gals for all the hard work
Yes, me too. Was hoping for an early Christmas present, but will be patient. Ww all really do appreciate your effort on this and are certainly looking forward to it.

Charinna wrote:

FYI, too much Christmas preparations to get it done today (need to bake cookies for Santa, otherwise... no presents!!!).  Will shoot for Wednesday / Thursday.

 

CookieContainer cookieJar = new CookieContainer();
HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create("http://www.santaspresents.com");
request.CookieContainer = cookieJar;

HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();
int cookieCount = cookieJar.Count;

Oh, in my case cookieCount is about 140!

...and Santa came!
